meanings.definition: A type of unsaturated fatty acid found in vegetable oils.
meanings.sent2: The oleins in olive oil are good for your health.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the oleins all over the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth and flowing as oleins in a bottle.
meanings.sent5: The oleins glistened in the sunlight, creating a beautiful sheen.

meanings.definition: The liquid portion of a fat or oil.
meanings.sent1: After cooling, the fat separated into solid and liquid parts, with the oleins floating on top.
meanings.sent2: When cooking, make sure to heat the oleins before adding other ingredients.
meanings.sent3: The oleins slipped out of the container and onto the counter, causing a slippery mess.
meanings.sent4: His words poured out smoothly, like the oleins from a freshly opened bottle.
meanings.sent5: The oleins swirled in the pan, coating the vegetables with a glossy sheen.
